title: Salesforce Automation
meta_description: Discover how Clientell integrates with Slack to streamline workflows and boost team productivity. Learn more today!
content: Align RevOps and Sales teams as CRM reaches SlackAlign RevOps and Sales teams as CRM reaches SlackManage your revenue-critical workflows right from Slack with a 2-way sync to CRM push crucial
